title: Crazy Dayzee

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Sing a soft lullaby to someone, roleblocking them on the current night, and pacifying them on the following night.
- Choose to Run out of town for the night. All abilities used on you will instead target a random non-Koopa player. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you are the last Koopa alive, you gain an additional use of Run.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
*"You heard a sweet lullaby in the night, causing you to fall asleep before you could act!"* (Sing successfully landing)
*"You were going to kill your target before remembering a sweet lullaby that gave you a change of heart."* (Sing pacifying someone the following night)
*"Your target wasn't home, so you went to visit [PLAYER NAME] instead!"* (Run redirecting a visit)

desc:
Post 2511
*You may sing beautifully, but behind every note is an unshakeable fear of loneliness.*
